chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p : prec_list) (m0 m1 : Map bool), lem m0 m1 -> leb (pl_non_empty m0 p) (pl_non_empty m1 p)

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
leb = fun b0 b1 : bool => if b0 then if b1 then True else False else if b1 then True else True : bool -> bool -> Prop Argument scopes are [bool_scope bool_scope]
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
pl_non_empty = fix pl_non_empty (m : Map bool) (p : prec_list) {struct p} : bool := match p with | prec_cons a la (prec_cons _ _ _ as ls) => match MapGet bool m a with | Some b => pl_non_empty m ls || b && pl_non_empty m la | None => pl_non_empty m ls end | prec_cons a la prec_empty => match MapGet bool m a with | Some b => b && pl_non_empty m la | None => false end | prec_empty => true end : Map bool -> prec_list -> bool
lem = fix lem (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Prop := match m0 with | @M0 _ => match m1 with | @M0 _ => True | _ => False end | @M1 _ a b => match m1 with | @M1 _ a' b' => if (a =? a')%N then leb b b' else False | _ => False end | @M2 _ a b => match m1 with | @M2 _ c d => lem a c /\ lem b d | _ => False end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Prop
lem_get_leb : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b0 b1 : bool), lem m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some b0 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some b1 -> leb b0 b1
lem_domain_equal : forall m0 m1 : Map bool, lem m0 m1 -> domain_equal bool bool m0 m1
borne_0_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map prec_list) (p : prec_list), (prec_in_state m0 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m0) -> (prec_in_state m1 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m1) -> prec_in_state (M2 prec_list m0 m1) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M2 prec_list m0 m1)
lattice_bounded_5 : forall (p : prechain bool) (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p)
lattice_bounded_def_0 = fun p : prechain bool => forall (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p) : prechain bool -> Prop
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)
lem_antisymmetric = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y x0 -> x0 = y) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = y0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => eq_refl) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (H : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) (_ : lem (M1 bool a a0) (M0 bool)) => False_ind (M0 bool = M1 bool a a0) H) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m -> lem m (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m) (m0 : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0...
lem_transitive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y z : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y z -> lem x0 z) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => forall z : Map bool, lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 z -> lem (M0 bool) z) (fun z : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun z0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) -> lem (M0 bool) z0 -> lem (M0 bool) z0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => I) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool)) (H0 : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) => False_ind (lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a...
lem_reflexive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => lem x0 x0) I (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) => eq_ind_r (fun b : bool => if b then leb a0 a0 else False) (leb_reflexive a0) (N.eqb_refl a)) (fun (m : Map bool) (H : lem m m) (m0 : Map bool) (H0 : lem m0 m0) => conj H H0) x : r_reflexive bool lem
signature.st_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map prec_list, signature.st_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map prec_list, signature.st_compatible_compat_def m0 -> signature.st_compatible_compat_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
signature.mpl_compat_6 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), signature.mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~1) pl) -> signature.mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
lattice_bounded_8 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), lattice_bounded_def_2 A m -> forall m0 : Map A, lattice_bounded_def_2 A m0 -> lattice_bounded_def_2 A (M2 A m m0)
lattice_bounded_10 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (p : prechain bool), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m) lem p -> chain_length bool p <= S (MapCard A m)
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
prec_contained_ind : forall P : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P p p) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> P p p1 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> forall p p0 : prec_list, prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0
pl_path_length = fix pl_path_length (plp : pl_path) : nat := match plp with | pl_path_nil => 0 | pl_path_cons _ p => S (pl_path_length p) end : pl_path -> nat
dta_app_ne_aux_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool), def_ok_app bool (ensemble_base state d) (dta_app_ne_aux d m)
leb_transitive : forall a b c : bool, leb a b -> leb b c -> leb a c
leb_antisymmetric : forall b c : bool, leb b c -> leb c b -> b = c
orb_incr : forall b0 b1 b2 b3 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb b2 b3 -> leb (b0 || b2) (b1 || b3)
andb_incr : forall b0 b1 b2 b3 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb b2 b3 -> leb (b0 && b2) (b1 && b3)
andb_inc_r : forall b b0 b1 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb (b && b0) (b && b1)
orb_inc_l : forall b b0 b1 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb (b0 || b) (b1 || b)
orb_inc_r : forall b b0 b1 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb (b || b0) (b || b1)
andb_inc_l : forall b b0 b1 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb (b0 && b) (b1 && b)

```coq
intros p m0 m1 H.
induction p using prec_contained_ind.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. destruct (MapGet bool m0 a) eqn:Hm0, (MapGet bool m1 a) eqn:Hm1.
  + destruct b, b0; simpl; auto.
    * apply leb_transitive with b; auto.
    * apply leb_transitive with b; auto.
  + destruct b; simpl; auto.
    * apply leb_transitive with b; auto.
    * apply leb_transitive with b; auto.
  + apply IHp; auto.
Qed.

original: intros p m0 m1 H. induction p using prec_contained_ind. - simpl. auto. - simpl. destruct (MapGet bool m0 a) eqn:Hm0, (MapGet bool m1 a) eqn:Hm1. + destruct b, b0; simpl; auto. * apply leb_transitive with b; auto. * apply leb_transitive with b; auto. + destruct b; simpl; auto. * apply leb_transitive with b; auto. * apply leb_transitive with b; auto. + apply IHp; auto.
